CHILDHOOD:
Jamieson had a pretty nice childhood.
He grew up in Kitchener Canada. He has a younger sister and spent his childhood summers playing on the beach of Lake Huron in a town called Kincardine. Btw if you ever want to chat about something else, just say 'done'. %[I want more details about his family](postback:childhood_family)
I WANT MORE DETAILS ABOUT HIS FAMILY:
His parents we're married in 1966 and recently celebrated their 50th anniversary.
His sister lives in Toronto and works as a teacher and he has two nieces in Toronto and one in Calgary
EDUCATION:
Jamieson has always been an independent and creative type.
After university, Jamieson felt the need for an adventure and ended up moving to London without previously being visiting. Needless to say he found his adventure, and his career. %[Why London?](postback:why_london) %[Why User Experience?](postback:why_user_experience)
WHY LONDON:
Jamieson had recently graduated from university and was desiring to get out into the world. 
A friend had returned from London and had fondly spoke of his time there. 
A visit to the UK embassy in Toronto and Jamieson found out that he could get a 5 year visa because of his English Grandma. %[So what happened when he got there?](postback:england_early_days)
ENGLAND EARLY DAYS:
A lot. In hindsight Jamieson would tell you that its better to play these things before, but he was 24. 
After a half of a year of life lessons Jamieson knew he needed to get into a different path
WHY USER EXPERIENCE:
Jamieson, became a web designer when noone really knew what to call the position. 
Web Designer, New Media Designer and even Hypermedia Specialist were all used before UX Designer became the best way to define his career. 
Jamieson found success early working for Channel 4 as their education web manager. 
That meant that Jamieson designed websites for educational tv as well as updated the online TV guide a few years before CMS made that easy. 
After that Jamieson worked for Sony Interactive Europe before he joined on with APL Digital %[What happened next](postback:tech_crash)
TECH CRASH: While at APL DIGITAL Jamieson got to work for some of the world's most renown brands getting them online. He might have stayed on in London forever if not for the tech crash of 2001. Before long, Jamieson found himself back in Canada where he worked a bit in his hometown before moving on to Vancouver.
